review: Fantastic! I own a chrome cast and now the Firestick. The Firestick wins hands down. Easy to use, no glitches, love it!!
author: Peter Rustad

review: I knew that they would be slower than the Amazon Fire box, but I am not happy with how much slower they are. These sticks often will freeze while streaming, and I don't have that same problem with my Fire box.  Given the choice again, I would rather have purchased a second Fire box.
author: JARED R CLEMENCE

review: Great price for what you get, I like how the kindle fire links up to this, I can use my iphone to navigate this.  Sometimes it resets itself.  It does get very hot after a little while running.
author: B-MAC

review: My "Smart" Blue Ray player was not compatible with Amazon, but with the stick I can access my movie options! YAY!!
author: Charlotte Landrum

review: I tried two Fire TV sticks and neither would stay connected to our network.  We have a chromecast and now a Roku that we have no issues with whatsoever.  Do yourself a favor and steer clear of the fire stick.
author: S. M. Keffer "Cheshirecattat"

review: Surprisingly good.  Video quality is great, although I can't seem to get it to work via my audio receiver.  Doesn't seem to accept my Prime subscription (obtained via my GF's account), but works with hers fine.  Not sure if that's intentional on Amazon's part.
author: Abu Amiri
